original_text: They will decide to do that because God has given them those thoughts. So, they will do what he wants. They will give to the wild animal their authority to rule as king. The animal will continue to rule until everything happens that God has said will happen.
korean_text: 이는 하나님이 자기 뜻대로 할 마음을 그들에게 주사 한 뜻을 이루게 하시고 그들의 나라를 그 짐승에게 주게 하시되 하나님의 말씀이 응하기까지 하심이라

sentences.original_text: They will decide to do that
because God has given them those thoughts
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님이 그들에게 그런 생각들을 주셨기 때문입니다

sentences.original_text: So, they will do what he wants
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 그들은 그가 원하는 것을 행할 것입니다

sentences.original_text: They will give to the wild animal
their authority to rule as king
The animal will continue to rule
that God has said will happen
